org.threadly.concurrent.future

Class StaticCancellationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.threadly.concurrent.future.StaticCancellationException

  • public class StaticCancellationException
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to hold a singleton CancellationException to prevent needing to construct it.
